reviewText: I got my Canon XL1S on ebay and it did not come with instructions. I downloaded the manual from the web, and while it helped, I felt I needed more. I got this dvd and I am very happy. Get this dvd and you will be a wiz with your Canon XL1S. Easy to understand. I would recommend that you watch the dvd first, and then on the 2nd viewing follow along with your camera. Great dvd.

I bought a copy of this from Greg at last year's Resfest festival in San Francisco.  It is absolutely great.  I picked up several useful tips within just a few moments of watching. If you own a Canon XL1s, you need this dvd.
